item.title: job029
item.description: Job alias: None Plotly.d3.json("https://dzyla.github.io/Follow_Relion_gracefully/jobs/job029/refine3d_model_Refine3D_job029_.json", function(err, fig) { Plotly.plot('https:\/\/dzyla.github.io\/Follow_Relion_gracefully\/jobs\/job029\/refine3d_model_Refine3D_job029_.json', fig.data, fig.layout, {responsive: true}); }); Volume projections preview: 0 var val = document.getElementById("valR").value; document.getElementById("range").innerHTML=val; document.getElementById("img").src = val + ".jpg"; function showVal(newVal){ document.getElementById("range").innerHTML=newVal; document.getElementById("img").src = newVal+ ".jpg"; } Class Projections: Plotly.d3.json("https://dzyla.github.io/Follow_Relion_gracefully/jobs/job029/cls3d_projection_Refine3D_job029_.json", function(err, fig) { Plotly.plot('https:\/\/dzyla.github.io\/Follow_Relion_gracefully\/jobs\/job029\/cls3d_projection_Refine3D_job029_.json', fig.data, fig.layout, {responsive: true}); }); Plotly.d3.json("https://dzyla.github.io/Follow_Relion_gracefully/jobs/job029/cls3d_res_Refine3D_job029_.json", function(err, fig) { Plotly.plot('https:\/\/dzyla.github.io\/Follow_Relion_gracefully\/jobs\/job029\/cls3d_res_Refine3D_job029_.json', fig.data, fig.layout, {responsive: true}); }); Plotly.
